about_the_game:
The Final Rescue is an escape puzzle room game with the mechanics of rotating rooms.
You are the only survivor. You found out that a scientist was working on an antidote. In hope of finding something, you visit his house.

Game contains mysterious rooms, exciting puzzles and a great story. You need to solve puzzles, collect items to unlock doors, items .You have two options to select game style.





Features :
- Addictive gameplay and compelling storyline.
- Two gameplay styles.
- An exciting point-and-click game.
- Investigate the various locations from the mysterious rooms to the warehouse in 3D.
- Filled with classic puzzle games.
- Find hidden clues and objects to move to the next location.
- Complete logical tasks to explore the world.
- Embark on an adventurous journey to make discoveries at every step.
- Challenge the detective in you with our escape room puzzles.
- Enjoy the addictive graphics of our colorful 3D world.


What is an escape room?

An escape room is a game in which a player discovers clues and solves puzzles in one or more rooms to accomplish the task. The task is often to escape from the site of the game.
The final rescue offers you the thrill of playing the classic escape room with the twists of our tiny mysterious virtual world.

short_description: The world is plagued by a deadly virus. You are the last human to survive in what is left of the city, and perhaps even the world. Your only mission is to find a way to reverse the effects of the virus.
